DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine efficacy of epidural steroid for postoperative pain control after TKA
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Epidural Steroid for Controlling Pain After Primary TKA
DOC.detailed_description: Epidural triamsinolone can reduce postoperative pain and longer duration of pain control after TKA
DOC.criteria: osteoarthritis of the knee who undergoing unilateral primary total knee arthroplasty 5085 years old ASA class 13 unable to perform epidural anaesthesia history of drug allergies: lidocaine, steroid renal impairment (CrCl <30 mL/min) liver impairment cognitive function disorders displacement of epidural catheter
